definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
Tianqi Emperor, reign name of fifteenth Ming emperor Zhu Youxiao 朱由校[Zhu1 You2 xiao4] (1605-1627), reigned 1620-1627, Temple name 明熹宗[Ming2 Xi1 zong1]

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算铲完整条路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，论文明天应交，否则后果由个人负责。

sentences.english: I am going to Haverhill to-morrow, surveying, for a week or more.
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去黑佛希尔测量，大约得一个多星期。

sentences.english: I’d like to have two soft berth tickets to Shanghai for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我想买两张明天的到上海的软卧票。

sentences.english: Do whatever you can today, then continue on tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天，只管做你能做的，接着明天继续。

sentences.english: Whether we will go picnicking tomorrow depends on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 明天我们是否去野餐取决于天气好坏。

sentences.english: I'd like to make an appointment with Professor Smith. Would 9:00 tomorrow be all right?
sentences.chinese: 我想和史密斯教授约个会面时间。明天9点行吗？

sentences.english: I went to the sofa to rest and imagine tomorrow's sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我坐到沙发上去休息，想象着明天的日落会是怎样。

sentences.english: If he should come tomorrow, we would be greatly surprised.
sentences.chinese: 要是他明天来了，我们会大感惊讶。

sentences.english: I am watching a flower show with my friend tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天我将和朋友一起去看花展。

sentences.english: She can sow, so I will sow instead of her tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她会缝纫，所以明天我代她去播种。

sentences.english: Dianna is leaving for London tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 戴安娜明天将动身去伦敦。

sentences.english: All of these issues will be on the agenda tomorrow when I meet with President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 我明天与胡主席会晤时，会就上述所有问题交换看法。

sentences.english: I'm going to that new Cantonese restaurant tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我明天会去那家新开张的粤式餐厅。

sentences.english: If it rains tomorrow, we won't have morning assembly.
sentences.chinese: 如果明天下雨我们就不上晨会。

definition: three days from now/day after day after tomorrow
